title: Any ideas on what this font is?
content:
Hello,

I was curious if anyone would recognize this font. I know I have seen it before, any ideas?

Thanks in advance,  
Marcus
author: krohnmatic

comments.content:
Remind you of anything?  
Here's a hint: look at the "5".

hhp

Why do you insist on playing "Remind you of anything?" games? Can't you just come out and say what's on your mind without the tease? I've got more important things to do than come back here to see if anyone responds.

> I've got more important things to do than come back here

I'm devastated.

hhp
